00018 #ifndef __nec_radiation_pattern__
00019 #define __nec_radiation_pattern__
00020 
00021 #include "nec_results.h"
00022 #include "math_util.h"
00023 
00024 class nec_context;
00025 
00026 class nec_radiation_pattern : public nec_base_result
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         // Radiation Pattern
00030         nec_radiation_pattern(nec_context* in_context, int in_n_theta, int in_n_phi, int in_ifar, nec_float in_wavelength, nec_float pinr, nec_float pnlr)
00031         {
00032                 n_theta = in_n_theta;
00033                 n_phi = in_n_phi;
00034                 
00035                 int n_angles = n_theta * n_phi;
00036                 
00037                 _gain.resize(n_angles);
00038                 _power_gain_vert.resize(n_angles);
00039                 _power_gain_horiz.resize(n_angles);
00040                 _power_gain_tot.resize(n_angles);
00041                 _polarization_axial_ratio.resize(n_angles);
00042                 _polarization_tilt.resize(n_angles);
00043                 _polarization_sense_index.resize(n_angles);
00044                                 
00045                 _e_theta.resize(n_angles);
00046                 _e_phi.resize(n_angles);
00047                 _e_r.resize(n_angles);
00048                 
00049                 _ifar = in_ifar;
00050                 _wavelength = in_wavelength;
00051                 _pinr = pinr;
00052                 _pnlr = pnlr;
00053                 
00054                 m_context = in_context;
00055                 m_analysis_done = false;
00056                 _maximum_gain = -999.0;
00057         }
00058                 
00059         virtual void write_to_file(ostream& os)
00060         {
00061                 analyze();
00062                 write_to_file2(os);
00063         }
00064 
00065         void analyze();
00066         
00067         void write_gain_normalization()
00068         {
00069                 if (_ifar != 1)
00070                 {
00071                         nec_float norm = get_maximum_gain_db();
00072                         printf("Max Gain: %f\n",norm);
00073                 }
00074         }
00075         
00076         nec_float get_maximum_gain_db()
00077         {
00078                 return get_gain_normalization_factor(0);
00079         }
00080         
00083         real_array get_radiation_pattern()
00084         {
00085                 return _gain;
00086         }
00087 
00088 private:
00089         nec_context* m_context;
00090         bool m_analysis_done;
00091         
00092         real_array _gain;
00093         int n_theta, n_phi;
00094         
00095         int _ifar;
00096         
00097         nec_float _wavelength;
00098         nec_float _pinr;
00099         nec_float _pnlr;
00100         
00101         // quantitles...
00102         nec_float _average_power_gain;
00103         nec_float _average_power_solid_angle;
00104         nec_float _maximum_gain;
00105 
00106         real_array      _power_gain_vert;
00107         real_array      _power_gain_horiz;
00108         real_array      _power_gain_tot;
00109         real_array      _polarization_axial_ratio;
00110         real_array      _polarization_tilt;
00111         int_array       _polarization_sense_index;
00112                                 
00113         complex_array   _e_theta;
00114         complex_array   _e_phi;
00115         complex_array   _e_r;
00116         void write_to_file2(ostream& os);
00117         
00118         nec_float get_gain_normalization_factor(nec_float gnor);
00119         
00120         void write_normalized_gain(ostream& os, nec_float gnor, int inor);
00121 };
00122 
00123 // some auxiliary functions to be made private once
00124 // the radiation pattern calculation is done entirely
00125 // inside this class...

00127     nec_complex *eth, nec_complex *epi,
00128     nec_complex *erd, nec_complex ux, int ksymp, nec_float _wavelength  );

00131     nec_complex *eth, nec_complex *eph, nec_float _wavelength  );

00134     complex_array& scur, nec_complex *ex,
00135     nec_complex *ey, nec_complex *ez );
